data.title: Spare Dog Records – Malawi Music for the World
data.meta_description: Spare Dog Records is a Bristol based record label which releases and promotes music from Malawi, a small country in Central Southern Africa. We work with our sister project out in Malawi, Moto Wambili Studios, to record a range of original contemporary music from talented artists, in a place where p
data.text:
The Netherlands / Germany / June 2024

Netherlands

Jun 2 EINDHOVEN, Bridge Guitar Festival

Jun 5 ENSCHEDE, Sound Unbound Record Store

Jun 7 ROTTERDAM, Poetry International Festival

Jun 8 LEIDEN, Qbus

Jun 9 SCHIJNDEL, Ander Festival

Jun 12 TERSCHELLING, OEROL

Germany

Jun 15 ERFURT, Krämerbrückenfest

From Nkhata-Bay to the UK: GASPER NALI is getting ready for a jam-packed autumn tour. 21 shows in 29 days all over the UK!

Malawi’s own One-Man-Band Afrobeat Explosion with his 3-metre home-made Babatoni bass guitar, cow skin kick drum and the most beautiful and catchy and danceable tunes possible!

Check out dates and ticket links at: https://gaspernali.com/tours/

Joining Gasper on this tour is Malawian Reggae Poet Michael Mountain.

https://gaspernali.com/

https://michaelmountainmusic.com/

https://sparedogrecords.com/

Find Gasper’s and Michael’s music on the usual places, but preferrably on Bandcamp where they get properly paid:

https://sparedogrecords.bandcamp.com

See you on the road!

Well this is Quite Great! Since we’re at our best working with artists to produce really good music and organising tours, and at our worst trying to promote what we’re doing, I think this could be a game changer. The good people at QG will primarily help us spreading the word about Gasper Nali’s and Michael Mountain’s upcoming UK autumn tour and then who knows where it will take us?

We’re super excited to announce that Gasper Nali (MW) and Michael Mountain (MW) will do a joint autumn 2023 tour in the UK. So far 20 shows are booked in late September and October and more is on the way. Check dates and links to tickets below!

Gasper Nali is a roots one-man-band from the small town of Nkhata Bay on the shores of Lake Malawi. He plays a one-string home-made 3-metre long Babatoni bass guitar with a stick and an empty beer bottle, and together with a cow skin kick drum and catchy melodies, he creates the most amazing and danceable original Afro Beats possible!

Michael Mountain is a reggae poet and small-scale farmer. The front porch of his small house in the remote village of Viboko is his favourite place, and from there he can clearly see life from a different point of view, and put his reflections into song.

Click the venues to get your hands on tickets.

GASPER NALI SUMMER TOUR

UK July 2023

Gasper Nali is back with another UK festival tour in July 2023. And it’s soon – quick, get your tickets!

Jul 30 KENDAL CALLING, Lowther

Michael talking about plans. Singles, new album ‘Two Big Elephants’ out in 2023!

Michael’s wonderful 2015 album ‘Nowhere Else To Go’ is finally back and available online (Spotify, iTunes etc etc) It was down for a while due to changing digital distributor and we also decided to take the opportunity to give it a bit of a re-master. The bulk of the album is recorded live in Nkhata Bay, Malawi, in 2014, and it’s a collection of absolutely beautiful songs of life and strife in rural Malawi. Favourite track: Working With My Tools. Click the image to check it out!
